data.name: The Cycle: Frontier - Specialist Pack
data.detailed_description:
Want to show off your skills? With this pack you'll be ready for anything Fortuna III throws at you! You'll get three unique outfits, unique weapon skins, and enough Aurum and gear to keep you fighting!
Your Aurum balance and Cosmetic items are not affected by seasonal wipes, and any K-Marks and Gear from the packs will be regranted each season!

  • 1000 Aurum
  • 75000 Kmarks
  • 2x S-576 PDW
  • 2x C-32 Bolt Action
  • 2x Scarab
  • 2x Km-9 'Scrapper'
  • 2x Helmet (Uncommon)
  • 2x Shield (Uncommon)
  • 2x Medium Backpack
  • 2x Large Backpack
  • Specialist Scrapper
  • Specialist Machete
  • Specialist Wrangler Basesuit
  • Specialist Wrangler Vest
  • Specialist Wrangler Boots
  • Specialist Wrangler Gloves
  • Specialist Storm Runner Basesuit
  • Specialist Storm Runner Chestpiece
  • Specialist Storm Runner Boots
  • Specialist Storm Runner Gloves
  • Specialist Survivalist Basesuit
  • Specialist Survivalist Chestpiece
  • Specialist Survivalist Boots
  • Specialist Survivalist Gloves

data.short_description: Want to show off your skills? With this pack you'll be ready for anything Fortuna III throws at you! You'll get three unique outfits, unique weapon skins, and enough Aurum and gear to keep you fighting!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Italian, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: 2GB VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: 4GB VRAM
